question.title: Activity Manager Method Does Not Work - is there a new class we can use?
question.body:
I'm trying to build an app that blocks other apps. The Activity Manager doesn't seem to allow this anymore (Reference) based on the documentation here. It appears that the methods we would use have been deprecated for security issues.

Am I looking at this wrong? Or is there indeed a new way to access which apps are being used so I can then block them?
